Hello ! 

I am Sarah Verrart, I study biology in 2nd year of bachelor at Umons. My English teacher's name is Ingrid Van Lancker, and my data sciences' teachers are Philippe Grosjean and Guyliann Engels. 

This blog presents a category named "English for Science" which mainly discusses neurological diseases, my portfolio's subject. It also includes a "Data Science" category which contains works more specific of the Biological Data Science lesson.
